about_the_game:
Creature Collecting Card Game

Creature Rumble is a turn based strategy card game that pits you the player against various enemy teams with 65+ cards with unique ability's and stats to fight, collect, and upgrade. Each game is unique based on your playstyle and can be altered with different in game events and how you decide as the player to build your deck. With each creature being unique and creative from a Roman era brontosaurus to a Australian crocodile hunter(literally its a crocodile) you will never feel like there isn't a new exciting creature to collect. Creature Rumble was created by an indie developer and owner of Rhinosaur Gamez who wanted to create an immersive/casual card game experience while letting the players use there creativity and strategy to determine the outcome of each game.

Strategy

Creature Rumble lets the player start off buy collecting cards and trying to build the strongest deck possible. Each game is different based on unique round types that will alter the AI and environment while playing. Both teams are given 6 cards and only allowed to see each card that the enemy has shown, with both sides needing to use strategy to counter their enemy. The player needs to use strategy to not only build a powerful deck of unique creatures, but also make sure they have enough currency to survive to the next round. Each game is entirely unique and can fit any playstyle the user decides to use.

Unique Atmosphere

Each creature in Creature Rumble has a unique back story and explanation on how they were recruited into the rumble universe. Not only do the creatures have their own stats, they also have unique ability's that will shape how you play. Anything from a fat bison that gains health each time he destroys another creature, to a medieval gold fish that gains the user extra currency for each win. With mulitple unique maps for the player to buy and use, you will never feel bored with how the atmosphere feels, from an under water map to a diverse jungle each map will suit different playstyles. It is up to you as the player to decide how you want to play.

About Rhinosaur Gamez

Rhinosaur Gamez is a indie game development company created and ran by one person. I started it to pursue my dreams in game development and learn as much as I can while also having fun doing it. Anything supports the creator who is currently attending college pursuing a degree in computer science.
